https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9MfmOVyCNHhMCQxB0CdK6RGO91v.jpg 10 year old Amelia's parents think it's time for her to go to sleep permanently,..... leaving her broken body in a silent shallow grave. 50 years later, Mommy and Daddy are back from hell, intent on wreaking the same deadly discipline on anyone not in bed by nightfall As Night Falls
